title: Personalized Menus with AI: Custom Catering for Every Team Member
description: In today’s fast-paced corporate world, catering has moved far beyond generic menus and cookie-cutter food options. title: AI and Sleep: How EightSleep Uses Data to Personalize Your Night
description: In the fast-paced world of 2025, people are turning to technology to improve every aspect of their lives—including the way they sleep. title: AI governance framework to be released by Sept 28: Vaishnaw
description: The government will release an Artificial Intelligence governance framework by September 28 that would define safety boundaries to safeguard citizens from AI harm, and outline checks and balances, IT Minister Ashwini Vaishnaw said on Thursday, but added that the framework would not be

title: Gaganyaan’s Vyommitra is AI-enabled, half-humanoid robot, says ISRO chief
description: the vyommitra, designed by isro to fly aboard the uncrewed test mission of the gaganyaan spaceflight mission, will be an ai (artificial intelligence) enabled half-humanoid robot, the national space agency chairman v narayanan said here on thursday. this half-humanoid robot will be the first to be launched this december-end as part of the gaganyaan mission of sending humans to the orbit of 400 km for a three-day mission and bringing them back safely to the earth. “work is going on.
content:
COIMBATORE ;
THE Vyommitra, designed by ISRO to fly aboard the uncrewed test mission of the Gaganyaan Spaceflight Mission, will be an AI (Artificial Intelligence) enabled half-humanoid robot, the national space agency chairman V Narayanan said here o... [735 chars]

title: From Dantewada to Texas, United States Mahesh Goyal’s AI journey inspires generation

title: UCD and Met Éireann launch new AI forecasting centre
description: A new centre has been launched at University College Dublin (UCD) which will use artificial intelligence (AI) to transform weather forecasting, supporting Ireland's preparation for the growing risks posed by climate change.
